document_data.name: Blacktongue
document_data.mainbody: '''Blacktongue''', also known as '''blacktongue fever''', was a well-known [[disease]] in [[Faer√ªn]], and was one of the so-called [[Five Fevers]].
document_data.Acquisition: Blacktongue was transmissible through ingesting the disease. Symptoms manifested within four days.
document_data.Effects: Sufferers of blacktongue experienced fever blacktongue could ultimately be fatal as the sufferer's tongue turned black and swelled to fill their mouth.
document_data.History: [[Ilisar]], the [[Waterdhavian]] [[tailor]] for whom [[Ilisar's Alley]] was named, died of blacktongue.
